advancement.behemoths.obtain_behemoth_he: Obtain a Behemoth's heart by slaying it.
advancement.behemoths.obtain_magnalyth_i: Fill a Behemoth Heart's energy and use it to craft a Magnalyth ingot.
advancement.behemoths.tame_hollowborne.d: Successfully tame a turretless Hollowborne using soul sand or other soul-related items.
item.behemoths.behemoth_heart.jei_descri: This item has a chance to drop when slaying a Behemoth.
item.behemoths.mortyx_upgrade_smithing_t: This item can be found in overworld underground structure loot. Its generation chance increases as there are more active Pandemonium Curses in the world.
item.behemoths.smithing_template.mortyx_: Add Magnalyth weapon or tool tool here
item_specialty.behemoths.behemoth_damage: Deals %s damage against all behemoth entities.
item_specialty.behemoths.undead_damage_b: Deals %s damage against all undead entities.
overlay.behemoths.voting_progress: Voting in progress. Press [%s] to open voting screen.
pandemonium_curse.behemoths.archzombie_d: Archzombie leaders can now spawn along with 2-4 Archzombies surrounding them.
pandemonium_curse.behemoths.deadly_hollo: Hollowborne projectile velocity and damage increases by x1.5.
pandemonium_curse.behemoths.feral_horde_: Zombies gain increased attack power when near other undead entities.
pandemonium_curse.behemoths.fragility_de: Natural regeneration is slower and hunger depletes more quickly.
pandemonium_curse.behemoths.gravebreaker: Banishing Stampede chasing speed: x1.3. Banishing Stampedes ridden by Archzombies can now also ram.
pandemonium_curse.behemoths.heavy_arrow_: Skeleton now have a 15% chance to boost its arrows, gaining increased velocity and knocking targets back further.
pandemonium_curse.behemoths.overseer_des: Hollowborne Turret's max HP increases by x1.3 and now gains a 30% damage reduction against any projectiles.
pandemonium_curse.behemoths.phantom_stee: Chance for an Archzombie to spawn with a Banishing Stampede: 5% -> 25%.
pandemonium_curse.behemoths.quickdraw_de: Skeletons now gain increased movement speed and shoot more frequently.
pandemonium_curse.behemoths.relentless_d: Zombies move x1.5 faster at night and can detect players from a much greater distance.
screen.behemoths.curse_selection.title: SELECT YOUR CURSE.
tooltip.behemoths.heart_energy_desc: Can only be used as a crafting material when the Heart Energy is full, then all of it is consumed when used. Heart Energy slowly replenishes while in your inventory, but each Behemoth Heart you carry reduces the recovery speed. Defeating Behemoths restores a large amount of Heart Energy.
